# Speck

> Speck is a specification-driven development tool that helps developers plan, track, and implement features using AI-assisted workflows with Claude Code.

Speck provides structured workflows for feature development, from initial specification through implementation, with support for monorepos, multi-repo setups, and git worktrees.

- [Quick Start](https://beta.speck.codes/docs/getting-started/quick-start.md): Get started with Speck in minutes

- [Commands Reference](https://beta.speck.codes/docs/commands/reference.md): Available slash commands
- [Configuration](https://beta.speck.codes/docs/configuration/speck-config.md): Configure Speck for your project
